attributes.action: Ban the use of Zombie Knifes in the UK and harsher punishment coming with Knives
attributes.additional_details: I want you for the government to do it because right now especially in the UK more and more people are using Knifes which is shattering their dreams and ruining their life and their future. And i want to prevent that and give everyone a fair way to chase their dreams.
attributes.background: I want for my community to be more safe when going around areas around London. I want for there to be more rules and harsher punshiments when people get convicted when they get arrested for the use in Knife Crime

rejection.details:
The sale, production, and importation of zombie knives in England and Wales are already illegal.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714854
